Global Variable# NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core

macOS 10.10–10.14Deprecated

```
var NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core: Int { get }
```

Deprecated

OpenGL API deprecated; please use Metal and MetalKit. (Define GL_SILENCE_DEPRECATION to silence these warnings.)

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core#Constants)

[`var NSOpenGLProfileVersionLegacy: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsopenglprofileversionlegacy)The requested profile is a legacy (pre-OpenGL 3.0) profile.Deprecated[`var NSOpenGLProfileVersion3_2Core: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsopenglprofileversion3_2core)The requested profile must implement the OpenGL 3.2 core functionality.Deprecated
